mapper.select: select * from(select row_number() over(order by product_no desc) as rnum,product_no,sub_category_code,title,price,point,kcal,volume,grade,thumbnail,image1,image2,image3, detail,upload_date,product_stock,exposure_state,category1,category2 from product order by product_no desc) where rnum between (#{curPage}-1)*9+1 and ((#{curPage}-1)*9+1)+9-1
